definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Additional heat energy is supplied with district heating utilizing geothermally heated water.
sentences.chinese: 额外的热能由区域集中暖提供，采用地热加热的水。

sentences.english: The Energy Saving Effect Analysis of Energy Saving Exterior Window in Hot Areas;
sentences.chinese: 热能储存材料用于储热或储冷，节能效果显著。

sentences.english: Here heat energy transforms to electricity.
The different varieties of the language are in a dynamic relationship with each other.
sentences.chinese: 这一章是关于热能转化成动力的。

sentences.english: The high-efficiency and energy-saving pot has the characteristic of high heat energy utilization rate.
sentences.chinese: 该高效节能锅煲具有热能利用率高的特点。

sentences.english: Iceland has already begun constructing a hydrogen grid using plentiful geothermal energy.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛已经着手建设一座利用丰富地热能源的氢气站。

sentences.english: The thesis discusses the merit of sewage heat energy collection deliver heat transfer method.
sentences.chinese: 论文论述了污水热能采集套管输送换热法的优点。

sentences.english: The water temperature originates in geothermy warming rate and the radioactive element decay has the heat energy.
sentences.chinese: 水温来源于地热增温率及放射元素的衰变产生热能。

sentences.english: Heat Transfer is the specialized basic course of Thermal Energy and Power Engineering (TEPE) Specialty.
sentences.chinese: 本课程是热能与动力工程专业的专业基础课。

sentences.english: The heat of the sun hatches turtles' eggs.
sentences.chinese: 太阳的热能将陆龟的卵孵出小龟。

sentences.english: The residual energy of heat will be excluded from the machine.
sentences.chinese: 直燃机排出的余热以热能的形式存在。

sentences.english: Enthalpy vectors are used to describe the amount and grade of heat energy at he same time.
sentences.chinese: 分析了热能在热力系统中的实际作功能力的计算方法。

sentences.english: Selecting experience of heat meters is summarized and specifications of its main components are evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了热能表的设计选用经验及主要部件的技术条件。

sentences.english: By using geothermal energy the whole building reaches low energy standard.
sentences.chinese: 通过使用地热能，整个建筑达到了低能耗标准。

sentences.english: Geothermal energy is generated in over 20 countries.
sentences.chinese: 地热能被二十多个国家作为发电能源。
